sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-barra', templateUrl: './barra.component.html', styleUrls: ['./barra.component.css'] }) export class BarraComponent { currentUser:any; constructor(private router:Router) { this.currentUser = sessionStorage.getItem('currentUser'); } onClickLogout() { sessionStorage.removeItem('currentUser'); this.router.navigate(['portfolio']); } }
